rules_text: [i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
special_text:
I, II – Put your choice of a flying or hexproof counter on target creature you control.
III – Creatures you control with counters on them can't be blocked this turn unless defending player pays {3} and spells that target those creatures cost an additional {3} to cast until your next turn.
​
